website_summaries.verdict: A compact, portable LED lamp. The highest quality for the least amount of money.
pros: A broad spectrum of quality LED lighting for a budget price
cons: LED is not replaceable after it wears out

customer_reviews.title: The concept is great, but the lamp is not...
customer_reviews.text: The first lamp quit holding a charge after a couple of months of infrequent use. Hisgadget sent me a replacement, but the second lamp was worse than the first - it quit working completely after only using a few times. I returned this and asked for another replacement, since my original purchase was still under warranty. Instead they issued me a refund and have asked me multiple times to change my rating since "a low rating review really sets us back by a lot." If you make a product that doesn't quit working after a few months, and don't harass customers to change reviews, you would likely get better product ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product. Bought 3 at once because they were so cheap. Work ok when plugged in, however, do not work well at all with out the chord. Supposed to be a rechargeable internal battery. Yeah not so much! One didn't work at all with out the chord, and it wouldn't matter how long i tried to charge it. The other two would actually turn on with out the chord, however, the light output was so weak that it's not even practical to use. Other than that, they work great when plugged in. Surprisingly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I find this lamp to be very useful. As well, the lamp is bright enough for tasks requiring direct light on the project. I move it from place to place frequently to light various projects or just to read. Now! something happened to my first lamp. I may have done something wrong in the recharge. The vendor has been wonderful. The best customer service I have received from any Amazon partner. They asked if I wanted a refund or replacement--my answer was a resounding "send me a replacement." Finally, I will buy another lamp after Christmas to take to my RV. So Good Quality, Wonderful customer service if you ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rider

customer_reviews.title: love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: love this lamp. my only concern is that the adjustable arm will become loose and flimsy over time with use. I use this lamp as a flashlight occasionally when i need to do something outside and it turns night into day and i really love the low profile of the lamp. I put it right at eye level and im not blinded by the bulbs and it doesnt block my vision of things behind it. update: my 1st lamp died within a month. I thought it might have been something I did to it so I tried another identical one and same thing...I wont buy another one from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz McPhereson

customer_reviews.title: Another great lamp from OxyLED!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased the OxyLED T100 for my disabled son's computer desk - he loves it. However, he was always trying to move it around to light up different areas around his desk. He was knocking everything over! That's when I saw this - pretty much the same light he uses now - but CORDLESS! Granted, this lamp goes out far less light than the T100. The on/off button is a little trickier for him to use as it's not an overly obvious button to push. But it works perfectly for what he wants - freedom to decide where to have the light for him.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, and the arm is very precisely adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the wife as her old halogen reading light died. This gives off even light, and can be adjusted to low levels, which can help as she's prone to insomnia. Looks nice, and the arm is very precisely adjustable, which is a relieve from those old sort of spring-wound steel arms that you bend to where you want, and it flexes back too inches when you release it, so it's this game of back and forth to get it adjusted where you want it. None of that with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Theodoropoulos

customer_reviews.title: We're glad we bought this and highly recommend it for others ...
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp is light-weight and very flexible. It holds every direction I point the light in, and keeps a charge for weeks. We don't use it for long periods of time and keep it at the second level of brightness to extend the battery life. The brightest setting is very bright. We're glad we bought this and highly recommend it for others to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: PV couple

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly to my satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: I loved just about everything from this lamp. Not only is it modern because of its sleek design as well as its portability, it's touch controlled. That's just sick in my mind. You can recharge it for portable use! It's got 3 brightness levels, low, medium, and high. Overall, I loved it because of everything it entailed. Even the packaging was very hip. PROS Very lightweight Easy to move and store Flexible neck and head allows light to be moved anywhere Anti-glare for your eyes CONS The touch control is slightly sensitive I recommend this for anyone looking to buy an affordable yet efficient lamp.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Light, even where there's no AC outlet nearby
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I can see, even where there's no AC outlet nearby. Plenty of light, and a charge lasts days. Quality made and good looking. My only two complaints are that it uses a non-standard charger (but the charging cable is included), and that there is no charge indicator or any way of telling when it's fully charged or about to run down. Even so, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Too many books, not enough time

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cordless table lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Got it for my hubby. He tends to looks at mail and bills on the coffee table, without overhead lighting in the middle of a large living room, this was a better option than his cell phone light. I will eventually find an arc floor lamp, but for now it is perfect. It is simple in design, has 3 levels of brightness, very light, a small foot print and has not needed a charge since taking out of the box on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Average Jo

customer_reviews.title: This lamp has been amazing for art and crafting projects all around the house
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has been amazing for art and crafting projects all around the house. It's very easy to take from place to place and puts out good bright light; even with the room lights on, I found that it adds that extra bit of eye-saving clarity to small and detailed work. It is very easy to set on a table or flat sofa arm, and the flexible neck has held up well to my moderate amount of adjustment. Only once have I run out of battery power, after many hours of knitting on the couch without taking a break...which was much harder on myself than the lamp, I'd imagine!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT DESK LAMP
customer_reviews.text: What a delightful lamp! It is absolutely perfect in every way. It takes up little space, is lightweight, easy to move, and it gives great light in four degrees of brightness. As a writer who spends up to 16 hours a day at the computer, this lamp serves my purposes 100%. I have already recommended it to others, and I hope that this review will encourage even more people to purchase it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lamp for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp style and function this thing is priced amazing for what you get. This lamp is simple to use one touch for three levels of brightness and can be moved any way you want to adjust it and will hold that position until you change it. I will defiantly buy 3 more of these for my work office as well as my daughters room. This thing even has a battery so you can move it around or use it as a emergency light if needed.
customer_reviews.author: SPY

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I would have given 5 stars if the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I would have given 5 stars if the battery lasted longer on the highest setting. I would have gladly traded a slightly bigger/heavier base for longer life. My wife works at our kitchen counter for 8 hours each day, and we were hoping this would last a good portion of that. She ends up charging at lunch. Still a very nice lamp though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I purchased this for my mother who lives in an assisted living facility. It is on her desk and she takes it with her to the dining room so that she can see to eat her meals because the dining room doesn't have enough light for her macular degeneration. She just plugs it back in once back in her room and uses it on her desk. Lots of great light.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Flexible Light
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! It's lightweight but well balanced with a wide base that won't tip easily. Three levels of brightness and super easy to operate. It's easy to point wherever you need bright white light. I bought it so I can craft, color and read at night on cloudy days and on my back porch where there is no light or outlet and it's exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: why isnt mine working properly??!
customer_reviews.text: What's up with mine? I charge it, and it has good light for 30-40 minutes, then starts to dim. Worthless after an hour. I've tried 2 hour charges and 4 hour. Same thing. Was looking forward to this light. Sleek, perfect for my space, modern looking. $20 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Can you PLEASE tell me how to turn this ON ...
customer_reviews.text: Can you PLEASE tell me how to turn this ON for OFF ! I manage to turn it on after several minutes of either stroking around the ON/OFF spot or pressing quite hard. I can get it to brighten (well done!) But to turn it off gives me no end of problems. It seems to be a process that is hit and miss. Finally get it to turn off then darn me I go to my studio a few hours later and it is shining brightly. I despair!!!
customer_reviews.author: GRM

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I just keep buying them
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I just keep buying them. I have them in my office and at home. They are rechargeable and then you can unplug them and take them anywhere. I use them on the piano and for reading. They are built to be easy for your eyes. very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nora L. Ishibashi

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea what this would be like when I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea what this would be like when I ordered it, I just wanted something portable that I could use for reading in bed or for close work, writing cards etc. The design is most attractive and after a short while of charging it worked perfectly and I was surprised when I found it had three settings of brightness. Would certainly recommend this stylish rechargeable light to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LadyP

customer_reviews.title: Cordless Rechargable LED Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: These desk and table lamps are elegant and easy to use providing just the right light for every situation. There are many choices from the seller Hisgadget Inc on Amazon but this lamp is among the least space taking and most esthetically pleasing of any LED lamp and I like that it only uses about 5watts of electricity. The 24 LEDs are easy to look at and are flicker free. Good company to buy from!
customer_reviews.author: critter number one

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Great little light. Gives off three light levels with the brightest being perfect for reading. The head is flexible and holds its position once you place it where you want. Feels fairly sturdy and the one touch operation works well. Battery life seems great so far. My only complaint is what others have said the power cable is rather short. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: SurfMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Like all the features.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two lamps for night stand reading lights. And for mobility for the guest room. Love the contemporary look, love the three light strenght settings - lowest is great for tablet, highest is not super bright but enough to read by without bothering your spouse who might be sleeping on the the other side of the bed. Also like the "switchless" touch control. Surprised at how long the charge lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Snyder

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 months! Used for maybe 5 minutes 4 times a week. DO NOT BUY! Update: Figured out that the lamp was not charging because the USB connection is not tight and when charging slips. I use a plug extender and lay the USB power plug down( flat) rather than hanging and it works! A nice small footprint lamp with good light.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Left in the Dark
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to be able to light our merch table in places where there is no electricity available. After only 2 weeks, the plug stopped getting juice to the light, and of course, the battery ran down. We'd love to say we liked this product, but the lamp we got stopped working- even with the plug- after two weeks- leaving us completely in the dark :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Dee

customer_reviews.title: The lights are great - I have two others that have been flawless ...
customer_reviews.text: The red LED at the on-off button doesn't work. Too much hassle to return for that issue. The lights are great - I have two others that have been flawless (until that same red LED just went out on one of them this week - and unhappy coincidence).
customer_reviews.author: Coaster

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, good light, good battery life - recommended purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good light output in a small footprint LED light that also looks good on my desk. Excellent battery life, and easy to charge, although I would have preferred a standard USB connection to the light instead of the proprietary connection on the light end (although it's not a major drawback).
customer_reviews.author: Phil Cee

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the brightness (at max level). There are three levels of brightness, which are really good for all kind of applications. In the brightest mode, it is bright enough to light up a small room of 10x10. Further, it can be detached from the charging cord, allowing you the flexibility of placing it anywhere. I also like the feature that it switches on by a simple tap. Looks elegant.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Got this desk lamp in an Amazon lightning deal worrying ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this desk lamp in an Amazon lightning deal worrying that it might not be bright enough for my needs. It is very bright and has 3 brightness levels which works with a light touch. The base is heavy enough to support the LED light. Am pleasantly surprised with this lamp enough to actually post this review which I rarely do here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Portable Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This was actually our 2nd unit. In brief, this is a terrific little fully-portable lamp. Yes, it really recharges either via an AC outlet or via a USB port on your computer. Yes, unplug it and it can go anyplace. Yes, the battery life is really quite good ... hours long.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this light. It is lightweight, easy to move around on my side table by my sofa. I like the 3 different light settings, it is easy to aim exactly where you want it without throwing off light where you don't want it.
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp because I needed a cordless lamp for reading. It is sleek, lightweight, the neck easily adjustable and the three settings for intensity are a nice feature. I use it on low as a nightlight in my kitchen where it recharges on the counter. I wish it held a charge longer, on the highest intensity setting it only holds a charge for 2.5-3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. Breen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present from my husband, and my kids loved it so much we ended up buying one for each of them as well. I love that it will run on battery for hours after it is unplugged. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: CG1001

customer_reviews.title: Awesome everywhere light!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rechargeable and portable lamp. I can take it to where I needed....garage, restroom, for the kids in the low light area of the house. It is not very tall, more like a desk lamp. If you are looking to read anywhere in the house or even a friendly card games in the back yard....this light will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: and is tall and flexible enough to move to a comfortable reading location
customer_reviews.text: Don't use the battery power, but for a desk lamp it's hard to beat. It has three levels of intensity, you can angle the head so the glare doesn't hit your sleeping partner, and is tall and flexible enough to move to a comfortable reading location.
customer_reviews.author: Iriemon - Fully paid purchase price for all items reviewed.

customer_reviews.title: Very Portable Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it. I guess I use the lamp more than the average user as the lamp has to be recharged frequently. Not a problem as I recharge it before going to bed to avoid it going dim on me in the evenings. I especially like it because it avoids my having a wire across the room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brick

customer_reviews.title: It's a good enough brightness at it's highest level for desk work
customer_reviews.text: The neck of the light is really flexible. My silly OCD hates me because it can never be in its truly straight form again. It's a good enough brightness at it's highest level for desk work. I feel like a modern detective.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, very bright, flexible lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little lamp. The base is a nice shiny black that looks nice. The neck is perfectly flexible and stays in whatever position I put it. The lamp has three brightness levels that you select on the touch-sensitive spot on the base. The brightest one is good for doing small work with your hands. It is nice that it came with a recharging cord and wall adapter; not all of the USB-charged lamps do.
customer_reviews.author: RRP

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed piece of work
customer_reviews.text: Hadn't realized what a featherweight this lamp is. It can be transported it easily on one finger and directed in any direction desired. A beautiful design. Would have preferred white (as shown in the product description and on the product box), but that was not offered as an option.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Quinn

customer_reviews.title: I like this lamp pretty much so far
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp pretty much so far, but was disappointed that the power adapter plug was missing. The cord was there, but no end plug that goes into the wall. I have to keep switching my phone plug when I want to charge it. I didn't want all the hassle of packaging it up and returning it and then waiting for another one to come. Also, I might use it 2 or 3 nights a week, but always have to make sure I charge it during the day first or there's not much power.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk light bright and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Versatile desk lamp! Light is very bright however it has a dimmer to adjust the intensity. With my use on average i needed to recharge the unit every 2-3 days or so. With heavy use i kept the included usb power cable connected. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. The light was purchased to help with my stamp collection sort out. The light is good. The arm bends well. The battery life is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C Cautley

customer_reviews.title: This was delivered quickly and after a charge worked great for about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered quickly and after a charge worked great for about 4 months. Then nothing, to late to return and does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Poppa E

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Lamp
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay charged for too long. Seems like it runs down pretty fast. But, I like the rechargeable feature. It's very light in weight and has a good light for reading. It has 3 setting. Low, medium, and higher. Light is kind of blue-ish.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and unusual product. The fact that it can become cordless makes it truly valuable in a power outage. I bought it to illuminate a dark area around my video equipment where it was impossible to see to change settings without a flashlight
customer_reviews.author: runs with scissors

customer_reviews.title: love this lamp - perfect night light
customer_reviews.text: love this lamp - perfect night light, laptop work light and reading light. Excellent and non-intrusive lighting. Great that it is completely mobile and rechargeable. I will order a second lamp and recommend it for a gift for anyone including students.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for bedside
customer_reviews.text: I have had the lamp for 2 days. Just to test battery life, I've left it on the low setting and its been on for 4 hours. I finally turned it off because I had to leave. The lamp itself seems to be well constructed, the three brightness settings are more the adequate for my bedside reading. I really like not having another cord to hide.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, very bright
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is well designed, the base stays put and it produces a lot of light. It is LED, so it has a bit of a flashlight effect, but you can aim it where you want the light to go. It's very lightweight and portable, and the battery lasts a long time, so you rarely have to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had heard about this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: The lighting in my house is poor for reading, doing crafts, etc. Love this little lamp; I keep it on the charger and grab it as I need light for any given project. It is extremely lightweight and portable. There are three brightness settings, the neck is flexible - all in all very handy. Only wish I had known about it sooner. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: great light for tabletops
customer_reviews.text: great light for tabletops, lightweight, easy to move around, and lamp itself is so easy to use. Flexible neck both up and down and sideways is easy to maintain. Would like it to be about 2" larger light but still highly recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Great light and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Had a small problem upon arrival. Customer service took care of the problem right away. Great light and very handy. This is my second light, my daughter took the first one. :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Burner

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars, If Possible. Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is so sophisticated I can't stand it! Just great. It lights, its bright, dim if you prefer. Touch lamp--I love this! It is freaking cordless, too. OMG, every product on Amazon should be this cool. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Grranimal

customer_reviews.title: Love this portable light
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable light. I bought two for my sons desk. IT works fabulously and looks very stylish. It's super lightweight and even comes with a plug for an outlet if you wish not to use it cordlessly. The three option for lighting is perfect and does not hurt their eyes. Especially my younger son who is sensitive to lighting. You will NOT be disappointed. The price is right and I am so glad I bought these. Even thinking about buying one for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Stavrou

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: My husband has RP, and cannot see well in dimly lit restaurants. We take this light with us so that he can enjoy his meal. It is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sleek! 3 levels of light. Can be used on it's own with a charge from your computer or wall outlet. Bendable to direct your light. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp! We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this lamp. We use it at our school desk. My girls have used it every school day. It can be portable when charged. We have used all the light settings at various times and that feature works great, as well as being able to direct the light where it is needed. Would highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best inexpensive desk light available. It does not take up much room; the LED lights are bright and easily adjusted. The only downfall is that the battery does not last long if current is not available. But when plugged in, it is marvelous.
customer_reviews.author: MW San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Very good light
customer_reviews.text: Update: Seller sent me a replacement unit and it works just as I had hoped. I guess I had a defective unit. Original: Will change brightness settings on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: This works great and gives a lot of extra light and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a light that I could move around without plugging in. This works great and gives a lot of extra light and is adjustable. Really like it
customer_reviews.author: KarSam

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy. Nice to be able to move it where ever you need it. Bright light too and battery lasts pretty long. It's our third one.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: but perfect for my husband to find his way to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Too dim for him to read, but perfect for my husband to find his way to the bathroom and back. Just touching the base to turn it on makes it much easier for him than reaching a lamp switch in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: kimsophia

customer_reviews.title: It turns out to be worthless and an unnecessary expense. I can't recommend anything else
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely did not provide sufficient reading light inside my camping tent. Lamp was placed behind me on a table as I laid on a cot. It turns out to be worthless and an unnecessary expense.Although I sent this item back and got my money refunded I can not recommend this item for those like me who want a BRIGHT lamp for night reading at a campsite. The high intensity mode requires that it be plugged in and recharged. Not likely to happen at a primitive campsite.
customer_reviews.author: zirf43

customer_reviews.title: It works, priced right, and USB!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a desk lamp, this is USB (or wall) powered which is a huge bonus. LED output isn't bad. Perfect for my needs. The three levels of brightness is also a plus. Great buy and prime!
customer_reviews.author: Snake Plissken

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: lamp works nicely. would like it more if base was not so big. would also appreciate know how long the charge will last and how long it takes to charge!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great little table light
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small light to use next to my couch and this works perfectly. The charge lasts a long time. It has three settings and the brightest setting is very bright. I would recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: GenziT

customer_reviews.title: even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Sleek and modern design. Couldn't find anything like this in a few stores. Three different light setting options, touch on/off, cordless, great size, can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend for a desktop use
customer_reviews.text: It is not that bright for night reading and studying. But it is okay for bed side light. Definitely, I do not recommend for a desktop use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delighted! Small
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted! Small, lightweight, and very portable, these lights are the perfect answer for areas where a cord would be a problem! I'd been concerned that the quality of light might be inferior or harsh, but that's not the case at all. I bought two, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Lost Lake Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Suggested to a friend, he bought one and is very pleased as well. The unplugged mobility factor is far more beneficial than I expected
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great light. I like it because I can move ...
customer_reviews.text: Great light. I like it because I can move it around and use it where I need extra light. Plugs into my laptop to charge via usb port, so it's very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Changed from 5 to 1 star. The lamp worked OK initially but started to turn on and off randomly on its own. Turns off several times in the middle of reading, and on at night, and will not stay off. Same thing with the on-off area switch. At the beginning it would turn on easily with barely touching, now it doesn't and randomly responds. Not a reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Worth every penny. Nice looking and sleek. I can move it anywhere...even outside. I came already charged so I could use it right away
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lamp idea.
customer_reviews.text: I love this light when it came in. I was surprised to find out it's capable of charging over USB, which I have permanently attached to my USB hub. The light has three brightness setting and it is highly adjustable. The light itself is plenty bright on the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: ... have bought other OxyLed lamps and this is our favorite. The fact that this comes with a cordless ...
customer_reviews.text: We have bought other OxyLed lamps and this is our favorite. The fact that this comes with a cordless feature makes it even more valuable. It's easy on the eyes. A must have for children's desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Marlborodixon

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp - I keep it plugged in and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp - I keep it plugged in and know I'll be using it when the power goes out during storms this spring & summer.
customer_reviews.author: MeMyselfandEye

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for years for a cordless lamp to use in my living room. I needed something that would give enough light to read by, but wasn't so bright that it would disturb the rest of my family while they watched TV. I ordered this lamp based on its description and have been completely thrilled with it. It's very light-weight, stays charged for a long time, swivels and has 3 brightness settings. It is absolutely perfect and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roden

customer_reviews.title: WORKS LIKE A CHARM
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great, as advertised. Seller shipped immediately and properly packed. It even had a charge in the battery but I went ahead and gave it a full charge to see how long it goes between charges. The cool (Kelvin Temp) LED light makes reading with my aging eyes much easier. (Eyeball lenses yellow with age filtering out warm light) I'm buying more.
customer_reviews.author: 3DDDave

customer_reviews.title: I really like this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Really nice lamp. Stylish, lightweight and easy to put it where you want it. Several brightness levels make it useful for mood lighting or maybe for reading.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ullman

customer_reviews.title: This little light of mine!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best lights! They charge when plugged into a wall but retain the charge so you can use it wireless and it has 3 levels of light!
customer_reviews.author: Micki B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light for hard-to-see tasks!
customer_reviews.text: This light provides the perfect task-lighting that my husband requires. It is so portable and easy to use on his various projects to illuminate the task at hand.
customer_reviews.author: marmet

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as I expected. I would spend the same amount for a brighter desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: CDHB

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The light delivers what it offers! Three great settings, easy to move around, and the light last a long time without being plugged in. I am very happy with this product and glad I bought it for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Maul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. 3 Different Setting of brightness. Bendable stem. Cord comes with to charge when it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Shena

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at though
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a charge for long. I bought two. The one I have at work I keep plugged in all the time. Nice to look at though, and the light is easy on the eyes - no glare.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item. It isn't very bright at ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. It isn't very bright at all. I had it on my nightstand, would shine it directly on my book, and it still was very dim. And if it matters, that's with a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really been so satisfied with a desk lamp before. The three light settings range appropriately from the extra bit of light you need to read at twilight, to fully illuminating a desk at night. Very light, very portable, and looks pretty sleek too.
customer_reviews.author: David McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I use this on my photo shoots ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use this on my photo shoots at parties where I print on site. Good clean light, very portable, small footprint, sleek design!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small secretary desk we bought for corner of our apartment bedroom. Good light, which can be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredBirder

customer_reviews.title: These lights get nice and bright and are perfect for a nightstand
customer_reviews.text: These lights get nice and bright and are perfect for a nightstand. They can even double as lights used to make video reviews of small products.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the lenght of arm
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the lenght of arm. It barely reaches over book. I have to sit it on the arm of the chair to see my book pages it"s not as bright as I would like it to be. The batteries seem to run out quickly, too.
customer_reviews.author: becky evans

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase :)
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift to my husband. We love it!!!! Using it for over than 6 months and it's like new! :)
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: They are great. Super bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. They are great. Super bright, easy to charge since they have a USB chord.
customer_reviews.author: Murium

customer_reviews.title: Great light for travel or home
customer_reviews.text: I still have the first one I bought and this is the 2nd. Great light for travel or home. Bright, flexable, with good base weight. Packed in a nice box with a handle which is convenient for traveling. Will be buying a 3rd. Good for camping also.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, but it quit working 13 months after I bought it. I only used it on a few occasions when it flickered and stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It appears to be a quality product and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It appears to be a quality product and the light levels are effective. If it holds the quality it will be a five.
customer_reviews.author: See Here

customer_reviews.title: Very light and portable- looks good- Unplugged only lasts about ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light and portable- looks good- Unplugged only lasts about 5 hours Cord is very short only about 2ft. So must have an outlet close- wish cord was longer By.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pugar

customer_reviews.title: Caution using charger
customer_reviews.text: Word of caution. The charging plug is very similar to others with a different voltage. The touch switch on an earlier purchase failed-probably because I plugged the charger for a calculator into it inadvertently. Liked the features well enough to give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good price, great light, perfect for those dark places. Seems to last a really long time on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp for a desk
customer_reviews.text: Got this light for my husband's desk. It works well and takes up very little room. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great little desk lamp. The light is soft and is perfect for bed reading. Very easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: F.W.

product_meta.title: OxyLED OxyRead Q3 Ultra-thin Touch Control Smart Rechargeable LED Desk Lamp
product_meta.description:
OxyLED -- Natural Life, Natural Lights


OxyLED Q3, the thinnest LED desk Lamp on the market, Having the capacity to be moved around the room independently, melding fashion and style, enables uniform distribution of LED light without direct glare and emits soft and even beams. OxyLED Q3 Smart LED desk lamp, with adjustable brightness, is capable of swiveling, rotating and tilting flexibly for desired lighting height and angle. It is no doubt a great choice for you. 

Features:
Classic appearance: Minimalist Design, simple and classic 
Eye-protective: Strobe flash-free, no ghosting and eyestrain preventable
rechargeable: Having the capacity to be moved around the room independently
Light comfortable: Chip on board offers pure, soft and comfortable light
LED Source qualified: LED chip from World-class manufacturer
Energy-saving: Save 60% without mercury compared with CFL
Zero electromagnetic radiation: truly Zero-radiation
Long lifetime: Exceed 50000 hours

Specification:
-Model: Q3
-Power: 5W
-Dimensions: 6.61" x 6.61" x 10.75"
-Color: Black, White
-Net Weight: 1.549Kg
-Material: ABS CIM
-Brightness: 30CM>500LUX, 3 levels brightness
-Color temperature: 5000-5500K
-Color rendering index (CRI): Ra>80
-Input: 110-240V AC 50/60HZ
-Output: 5V DC 1A
-Li-polymer battery: 3.7V 1000mA (can continues work about 2~60 hours, depends on the level of brightness)
-LED life: >50000 hours

Packing list:
-1 * OxyLED Q3 LED Lamp; 1 * Adapter; 1 * User manual
feature_bullets: Battery type: Li-polymer battery; Battery watt hour (Wh) measurement: 3.7V*1000mAH;battery contained within; Battery weight: 45g
